application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus)Approx Height - 11m Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 6mLocation - Rear garden, Rear boundaryService - Crown ReductionWork required- Reduce crown all round by upto 2m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions leaving acompleted height of 9m and spread of 4m. (Does not include pruning neighbours side as they are paying for thoseworks).Reason - As per customers wishes to reduce encroachment over adjacent garden while maintaining a balanced crownT3 - Holly (Ilex aquifolium)Approx Height - 6mLocation - Rear garden, Left hand boundaryService - Hedge TrimmingWork required- Trim all round by approx 0.5m to best compact formReason - As part of regular cyclical maintenance, to reduce encroachment over adjacent property and ease futuremaintenanceT4 - Acer sp - Approx Height - 7m Approx Crown Spread Diameter - 5mLocation - Front garden, Front boundaryService - Crown ReductionWork required- Reduce crown all round by upto 1m, pruning to suitable growth points/branch fork junctions, leavinga finished height of 6m and spread of 4m.
